name: Cast VR
storyline: The King is missing and you have been summoned for your magical abilities. You must explore the castle - it is the centre of all magic. Unlock the mysteries to find the king, save his daughter, and if you can save the world.
summary: Unravel the mystery and embrace the magic! In Cast VR, an adventure RPG, you will explore a magical world and uncover the mystery of the missing King. Your wand and spell book are how you navigate the world. Discover and use spells to interact with objects and defend yourself against enemies. Explore the castle, solve puzzles, learn about the world and piece together the mystery.
